sentences.en: A few gentleman farmers with plenty of money can still escape to the bucolic life.
sentences.cn: 只有少数殷实的绅士仍然可以避居乡间过着田园生活.

sentences.en: Best though it was, his suIt'smacked of cheap tailoring and bucolic unfashionableness.
sentences.cn: 虽然他穿的衣服料子很好,但缝制费是便宜的,式样是土里土气的.

sentences.en: Bucolic, conservative stuff, but nice and solid.
sentences.cn: 这是农村风味的保守的作品, 但是很好,很扎实.

sentences.en: Despite this bucolic portrait , Iowa has its share of urban landscapes, too.
sentences.cn: 尽管这样的田园描绘, 艾奥瓦还有其城市的一面.

sentences.en: He managed to transform the bucolic of butterflies into a dangerous sport.
sentences.cn: 他居然把捉蝴蝶的田园消遣变成了一种危险的游戏.

sentences.en: It is a bucolic refuge in the midst of a great bustling city.
sentences.cn: 它是处在繁华的大城市之中的世外桃源.

sentences.en: She turns into a sweet country girl surrounded by family, chickens and a bucolic landscape.
sentences.cn: 她变成了被家人 、 鸡与乡村景象所围绕的甜美乡村姑娘.

sentences.en: The keenest of bucolic minds felt a whispering awe at the sight of the gentryGeorge Eliot.
sentences.cn: 乡下人,极为敏感的心灵使他们看到文雅的人便感到一种窃窃的敬畏(乔·艾略特).

sentences.en: The keenest of bucolic minds felt a whispering awe the sight the gentry ( George Eliot ).
sentences.cn: “乡下人,极为敏感的心灵使他们看到文雅的人便感到一种窃窃的敬畏” ( 乔·艾略特 ).

sentences.en: There are other signs in my bucolic town that the economy is cooling station.
sentences.cn: 在我所居住的这个小镇,还有其他一些地方也可以看出经济正在降温.

sentences.en: Thorntown's bucolic bliss was to a corporate sponsor , Campbell Soup. But such efforts are not enough.
sentences.cn: 索恩镇的田园快乐要感谢康宝浓汤的企业赞助, 但光靠这种努力是不够的.

words.tran_cn: 牧歌的；牧羊的；乡下风味的

trans.tran_cn: 牧民生活的，田园风味的，乡村风味的
